Title: The Landline
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Barry Safchik, Michael Platt
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Grace learns her friend Mary has died. Sol has an idea concerning getting Frankie to be officially recognized as alive again. Mallory tries to pitch her business idea to Brianna.
